Articles.Content:
**Military Craft Submission for new KSP series!!!**

**LAZARUS**

(Name of series)

(May or may not be inspired by the film Interstellar)

YouTube : JID00 gaming (With space)

Rules:

- Must Be under 500 Parts

- Must come with launcher if needed

- Can not have more than 6 weapons

- Must be .craft files

Mods:

- BDarmory

- Burn Together

- RLA Stockalike

**I would like the submissions to be some what like these...**

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/bFcQ2)

**I don't mean looks, I mean functionality** ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

ENDING THREAD IN 3 DAY

**I am now part of a company and willonly be using craft submitted by deadline** ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) **** 

Please make the craft how ever you like, And I will include as many submissions as possible.

**Please tell me what side you want your craft to be on!** 

**Kerbals** **or** **Bad guys** **(Not sure if Kerbals or robots yet)**

The series will be part cinematic, part lets play. much like the beloved Kethane station series by HATBAT.

I ALSO NEED HELP COMING UP WITH NAMES FOR THE GOOD GUYS AND BAD GUYS.

It will take place in a near future setting after a intelligent robotic race (or just other Kerbals I'm not sure) from Tekto (outer planets mod) Take over Kerbin and Kerbals have had to take refuge on Duna and Laythe. They will be battling over the entire solar system, for the main goal of getting Kerbin back. I am planning making at least 30 episodes throughout 2 or 3 seasons. I'm writing the plot now and will start recording in the next few weeks. 

**I am looking for vehicles more suitable for ground or atmosp****heric battles, I will have battles in space but pretty rarely.**

(Will accept Space based crafts but may have a harder time including them in the series)

Everybody who submits a design will receive a shoutout.

**Any and all Submission are sincerely appreciated.**

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-03T17:27:56Z" title="04/03/2015 05:27  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 3, 2015</time> by JID00Gaming**

> 
> How about this?
> [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/113515-Space-battleship-Porcupine-WITH-Secret-Weapon?p=1795360#post1795360](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/113515-Space-battleship-Porcupine-WITH-Secret-Weapon?p=1795360#post1795360)

Thanks you very much! I will try to include this in the series! Although it will be harder because I will have less space battles than planetary battles.

But either way This is a very nice concept and i will try to include it.

Does it come with a launcher?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-31T01:50:06Z" title="03/31/2015 01:50  AM" data-short="9 yr">March 31, 2015</time> by JID00Gaming**

If you are looking for cool BD Armory craft, you could take a look at my company. (link in my sig). We make all kind of military craft there, it could just be a bit difficult to pick the ones with less than 6 weapons.

Some examples:

Newa cruise missile tank: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/97300-Kerbin-Orbital-Defence-Industries-BDarmory-required?p=1813262&viewfull=1#post1813262](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/97300-Kerbin-Orbital-Defence-Industries-BDarmory-required?p=1813262&viewfull=1#post1813262)

![sdImcrj.png](http://i.imgur.com/sdImcrj.png)

Rook battle tank: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/97300-Kerbin-Orbital-Defence-Industries-BDarmory-required?p=1784557&viewfull=1#post1784557](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/97300-Kerbin-Orbital-Defence-Industries-BDarmory-required?p=1784557&viewfull=1#post1784557)

![fz2DLKK.png](http://i.imgur.com/fz2DLKK.png)

Yaffle Mk1 low-budget fighter: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/97300-Kerbin-Orbital-Defence-Industries-BDarmory-required?p=1808305&viewfull=1#post1808305](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/97300-Kerbin-Orbital-Defence-Industries-BDarmory-required?p=1808305&viewfull=1#post1808305)![veWirO2.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/veWirO2.jpg)

Corv space fighter: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/97300-Kerbin-Orbital-Defence-Industries-BDarmory-required?p=1652619&viewfull=1#post1652619](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/97300-Kerbin-Orbital-Defence-Industries-BDarmory-required?p=1652619&viewfull=1#post1652619)

![ZPh10vl.png](http://i.imgur.com/ZPh10vl.png)

A completely modular defense satelite system: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/97300-Kerbin-Orbital-Defence-Industries-BDarmory-required?p=1744720&viewfull=1#post1744720](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/97300-Kerbin-Orbital-Defence-Industries-BDarmory-required?p=1744720&viewfull=1#post1744720)

![AONc6EA.png](http://i.imgur.com/AONc6EA.png)

And hereÃ‚Â´s the link to our craft list (pretty full): [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/104558-KODI-Military-Sector/page2](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/104558-KODI-Military-Sector/page2)

Side: I think Kerbals. Green to the win!

Name suggestions: 

Kerbals: United Confederation of Free Kerbol Planets (UCFKP)

 Robots: Technical Union of Occupied Worlds (TUOW)

Hope you like them! Maybe our company/your channel could even etablish some kind of "partnership". YouÃ‚Â´ll have to talk to the CEO about that.
